# Access Control Policy

## Control Statements

1. User access shall follow least privilege and be approved for defined duration.
2. Privileged activities shall be logged and reviewed by designated control owners.

## Traceability Matrix

| Section | CSCRF Ref | Control Summary |
|---|---|---|
| Access Governance | PR.AA.G1 | Access right lifecycle and periodic review |
| Privileged Access | PR.AA.G2 | Elevated access governance and monitoring |
